name: Star Catcher (itch) (KaneTheDev)
description:
A game creation made for the GeoJam 2022! You play as a character on a hexagon-shaped spaceship, exploring the universe! Your goal is to PICK A SIDE of the spaceship to construct a powerful rocket and use it to control your ship, dodge meteorites and collect shiny stars!

Check out my YouTube channel! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfQSBeOYlAhuYejz_Prii1g
